channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP -- SAP Business One Service Layer (B1_ON_HANA)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP -- SAP Business One Service Layer (B1_ON_HANA)

item.title: CVE-2018-2502|2024-08-05T04:21:34.181Z -- sap -- sap%20business%20one%20service%20layer%20%28b1_on_hana%29
item.description: TRACE method is enabled in SAP Business One Service Layer . Attacker can use XST (Cross Site Tracing) attack if frontend applications that are using Service Layer has a XSS vulnerability. This has been fixed in SAP Business One Service Layer (B1_ON_HANA, versions 9.2, 9.3).
